body:
I think it would also be helpful to mention that [`next_functions`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/autograd/python_cpp_function.cpp#L93) always returns a new python function.
So once can't rely on the address of functions defined in C like (like convolution and BN).
```python
m = nn.Conv2d(1, 1, 1)
out = m(Variable(torch.rand(1, 1, 3, 3)))
print(out.grad_fn)
print(out.grad_fn) # different ref
```
